quotes.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.text: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Your time is limited, don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Success doesn’t come from what you do occasionally, it comes from what you do consistently.
quotes.author: Marie Forleo

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.text: Success is not the result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.text: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
quotes.author: Kevin Durant

quotes.text: Success doesn’t come from what you do occasionally, it comes from what you do consistently.
quotes.author: Marie Forleo

quotes.text: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
quotes.author: Colin R. Davis

quotes.text: Success is going from failure to failure without losing your enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Success is not the result of making goals but rather of achieving them.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.text: If you want something you’ve never had, you must be willing to do something you’ve never done.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: To achieve greatness, start where you are, use what you have, do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
quotes.author: Joshua J. Marine

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: The greater the obstacle, the more glory in overcoming it. Skillful pilots gain their reputation from storms and tempests.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Hard times may have held you down, but they will not keep you down.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Challenges make you discover things about yourself that you never really knew.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.text: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.text: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.text: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsleigh
